description:
Zen is a powerful sorcerer turned king of the undead. While he challenges http://anidb.net/ch91583 [Satou] to a contest of strength and will for custody over http://anidb.net/ch93242 [Mia], his actual desire is to find and die by the hands of a true hero. He is reincarnated from Japan like http://anidb.net/ch92285 [Arisa].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Zen
